item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Meta 公司的扎克伯格正在为新的人工智能团队招兵买马
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）正在组建一个专家团队，以实现人工通用智能。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg is setting up a team of experts to achieve artificial general intelligence, Bloomberg News reported Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体呼吁打击 "零公里二手车
item.description: 中国执政党共产党的官方报纸在周四发表的一篇文章中说，中国应该结束将全新汽车作为大幅打折的二手车出售以摆脱库存的做法。【原文：The Chinese practice of selling brand new cars as heavily discounted second-hand vehicles to get rid of inventory should be ended, the official newspaper of the country's governing Communist Party said in an article published on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称现代汽车的稀土库存可维持一年左右
item.description: 参加现代汽车公司投资者电话会议的一位人士说，现代汽车公司的稀土库存可维持一年左右，预计近期不会受到中国限制出口造成的全球供应链中断的影响。【原文：Hyundai Motor has a rare earths stockpile that can last about a year and it does not expect any near-term impact from global supply chain disruptions caused by China's export curbs, said a person who attended a company investor call.】

item.title: 消息人士称，麦格理价值 36 亿美元的韩国天然气公司吸引了 KKR、Brookfield 和业内同行的兴趣
item.description: 两位知情人士称，麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）旗下韩国工业气体公司 DIG Airgas 的潜在竞购者包括投资公司 KKR & Co、布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）和法国液化空气集团（Air Liquide），交易价格可能高达 36 亿美元。【原文：Potential bidders for Macquarie Asset Management's South Korean industrial gas firm DIG Airgas include investment firm KKR & Co , Brookfield Asset Management , and French gas supplier Air Liquide , in a deal that could fetch up to $3.6 billion, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞安航空公司将以 5 亿美元从 CFM 购买 30 台新型喷气发动机
item.description: 瑞安航空周二表示，该公司已与喷气发动机制造商 CFM 签订了一项价值 5 亿美元的协议，购买 30 台新的备用 LEAP-1B 发动机，这些发动机将在未来两年内交付给瑞安航空。【原文：Ryanair said on Tuesday it had entered a $500 million deal with jet engine maker CFM for 30 new spare LEAP-1B engines, which will be delivered to the airline over the next two years.】

item.title: 中国美容品牌探索海外并购以刺激增长
item.description: 在国内增长放缓的情况下，一些中国顶级美容品牌，如珀莱雅和S'Young，正在探索收购较小的外国竞争对手，以扩大其产品组合，复制欧莱雅或雅诗兰黛等全球领导者的成功。【原文：Some of China's top beauty brands such as Proya and S'Young are exploring acquisitions of smaller foreign rivals to expand their portfolios and replicate the success of global leaders like L'Oreal or Estée Lauder amid slowing growth at home.】

item.title: 美国商业团体称华盛顿应将台湾视为伙伴而非对手
item.description: 台湾美国商会（American Chamber of Commerce in Taiwan）周二表示，美国应将台湾视为合作伙伴而非对手，取消新关税和拟议关税，恢复高层内阁互访，并达成双重征税协议。【原文：The United States should treat Taiwan like a partner and not an adversary, remove new and proposed tariffs, restore high-level cabinet visits and agree a double taxation deal, the American Chamber of Commerce in Taiwan said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，巴拿马运河老板称地中海航运港口交易威胁中立性
item.description: 巴拿马运河负责人 Ricaurte Vasquez 告诉《金融时报》，将巴拿马运河附近的两个港口出售给以地中海航运公司（MSC）为首的全球财团威胁到了运河的中立原则。【原文：The sale of two ports near the Panama Canal to a global consortium led by Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC) threatens the canal's principle of neutrality, the canal's head Ricaurte Vasquez told the Financial Times.】

item.title: 中国通货紧缩加剧，价格战愈演愈烈，30 美元买一个奢侈的 Coach 手袋？
item.description: 中国能源行业工人李敏（Mandy Li）喜欢偶尔买一个奢侈品牌手袋犒劳自己。但是，由于她的国有单位将她的工资降低了 10%，她家拥有的房产也贬值了一半，所以她只买二手货。【原文：Chinese energy sector worker Mandy Li likes to treat herself to a luxury brand handbag once in a while. But since her state-owned employer cut her wage by 10% and the properties her family owns lost half their value, she only buys second-hand ones.】

item.title: 中国汽车和科技巨头为何威胁特斯拉自动驾驶汽车的未来？
item.description: 在生产经济型电动汽车的竞争中，以比亚迪为首的中国电动汽车制造商击败了特斯拉。现在，在全球生产自动驾驶汽车的竞争中，许多同样激烈的竞争对手正驶入超车道。【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle makers led by BYD beat Tesla in the competition to produce affordable electric vehicles. Now, many of those same fierce competitors are pulling into the passing lane in the global race to produce self-driving cars.】

item.title: 早间竞标投资者渴望中美谈判取得进展
item.description: Johann M Cherian 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Johann M Cherian】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利为埃隆-马斯克拥有的 xAI 提供 50 亿美元贷款和债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，摩根士丹利正在代表亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拥有的 xAI 公司推销价值 50 亿美元的一揽子债券和两笔贷款，与此同时，这位世界首富与美国总统之间的不和正在公开上演。【原文：Morgan Stanley is marketing a $5 billion package of bonds and two loans on behalf of billionaire Elon Musk-owned xAI, at the same time as a falling out between the world's richest man and the U.S. president plays out in public, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二起试管婴儿事件震动了诊所和业界
item.description: 澳大利亚一家顶级试管婴儿服务提供商在第二次生育诊所事故中错误地为一名患者植入了自己的胚胎，而不是其伴侣的胚胎，这加剧了人们对这个直到最近才受到政府积极监管的行业的担忧。【原文：One of Australia's top IVF providers mistakenly implanted a patient with her own embryo instead of her partner's in a second fertility clinic mix-up, heightening concerns about an industry that did not have much active government oversight until recently.】

item.title: 中美谈判结果出炉前股市上涨，美元暂缓上涨
item.description: 周二，美国和中国之间的贸易谈判将延长至第二天，有初步迹象表明世界两大经济体之间的紧张局势可能有所缓和，因此股市上涨，美元保持警惕。【原文：Stocks were buoyant and the dollar remained on guard on Tuesday as trade talks between the United States and China were set to extend to a second day, with tentative signs tensions between the world's two largest economies could be easing.】

item.title: 交易员等待中美谈判细节，美元持稳
item.description: 美元周二在紧张的交投中持稳，因为华盛顿和中国政府仍在进行贸易谈判，这使得投资者对本周晚些时候的美国通胀报告感到不安，在下重大赌注时犹豫不决。【原文：The U.S. dollar was steady on Tuesday in tight trading as Washington and Beijing remained locked in trade talks that left investors on edge and hesitant in placing major bets while looking ahead to U.S. inflation report later in the week.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判将复会第二天
item.description: 周二，中美两国高级官员将在伦敦举行为期第二天的贸易谈判，希望在稀土等商品的出口管制问题上取得突破，因为这些商品的出口管制已威胁到全球供应链的震荡和经济增长的放缓。【原文：Top U.S. and Chinese officials will resume trade talks for a second day in London on Tuesday, hoping to secure a breakthrough over export controls for goods such as rare earths that have threatened a global supply chain shock and slower economic growth.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判结果待定，石油价格稳步上扬
item.description: 周二，市场参与者在等待中美会谈的结果，因为会谈可能会为缓解贸易紧张局势和改善燃料需求铺平道路。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Tuesday as market participants waited for the outcome of U.S.-China talks that could pave the way for easing trade tensions and improve fuel demand.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，作为广告抵制调查的一部分，美国联邦贸易委员会要求顶级广告公司提供信息
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国联邦贸易委员会已要求一些世界顶级广告公司提供信息，作为调查广告和宣传团体协调抵制某些网站是否违反反垄断法的一部分。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has sought information from some of the world's top advertising firms as part of a probe into whether advertising and advocacy groups violated antitrust laws by coordinating boycotts of certain sites, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 中国国营媒体援引华为首席执行官的话称，美国夸大了华为人工智能芯片的成就
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，中国华为技术公司首席执行官表示，美国夸大了华为在Ascend人工智能芯片方面取得的成就。【原文：The United States is exaggerating Huawei's achievements when it comes to the Ascend AI chip, the chief executive of China's Huawei Technologies said, according to Chinese state media.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室放宽对非美国液化天然气运输船和汽车运输船的罚款和收费建议
item.description: 美国贸易代表软化了对非美国建造的液化天然气油轮和汽车运输船的收费建议，以对抗中国在公海的主导地位并振兴国内造船业。【原文：The U.S. Trade Representative softened fee proposals for non-U.S.-built LNG tankers and car carriers amid its ongoing effort to counter China's dominance on the high seas and revive domestic shipbuilding.】

item.title: 因贸易担忧，WPP 传媒将 2025 年全球广告收入增长预期下调至 6
item.description: WPP Media 周一表示，由于美国贸易政策的不确定性，今年全球广告收入预计将增长 6%，下调了此前 7.7% 的目标。【原文：Global advertising revenue is expected to grow 6% this year, WPP Media said on Monday, lowering its earlier target of 7.7% due to uncertainty over U.S. trade policies.】

item.title: 美国国务院电报称，该机构使用人工智能帮助招聘小组配备人员
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份周一发布的电报显示，美国国务院将使用人工智能聊天机器人来帮助其挑选对晋升和调动进行年度审查的人员。【原文：The U.S. State Department will use an artificial intelligence chatbot to help it select the people who will perform annual reviews of promotions and moves, according to a cable issued Monday and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 阿根廷启动 20 亿美元回购协议以增加储备金
item.description: 阿根廷中央银行周一表示，将启动一项高达 20 亿美元的回购协议（即 REPO），以增加其外汇储备。【原文：Argentina's central bank will launch a repurchase agreement of up to $2 billion, known as a REPO, to boost its foreign reserves, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 全食供应商 United Natural Foods 称网络事件中断了运营
item.description: 联合自然食品公司（United Natural Foods Inc）周一表示，该公司是美国最大的食品杂货分销商之一，其客户包括全食超市（Whole Foods）。【原文：United Natural Foods Inc one of the largest U.S. grocery distributors whose clients include Whole Foods, took certain systems offline in recent days after the discovery of unauthorized activity on internal networks, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日 伦敦来电，股市走高
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司的 Naveen Chopra 加入 Roblox 担任财务主管
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）首席财务官纳文-乔普拉（Naveen Chopra）于本周一卸任，加入视频游戏公司 Roblox 担任财务主管。【原文：Paramount Global's chief financial officer Naveen Chopra stepped down from his role on Monday to join video gaming company Roblox as its finance head.】

item.title: 迪士尼将为 NBCU 持有的 Hulu 股份额外支付 4.387 亿美元
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼公司周一表示，将再支付 4.387 亿美元购买 NBCU 在 Hulu 中的权益。【原文：Walt Disney said on Monday it would pay an additional $438.7 million to purchase NBCU's interest in Hulu.】

item.title: OpenAI 的年化收入达到 100 亿美元，高于 2024 年 12 月的 55 亿美元
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，截至 6 月，该公司的年化收入飙升至 100 亿美元，在人工智能应用蓬勃发展的背景下，公司有望实现全年目标。【原文：OpenAI said on Monday that its annualized revenue run rate surged to $10 billion as of June, positioning the company to hit its full-year target amid booming AI adoption.】

item.title: 特朗普表示不会放弃埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "服务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他不会放弃埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司提供的 "星链"（Starlink）服务，并称这是一项很好的服务。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that he would not drop the Starlink service made by Elon Musk's SpaceX company, calling it a good service.】

item.title: 据报纸报道，轮胎制造商米其林将关闭位于墨西哥中部的工厂
item.description: 据《Reforma》周一援引米其林当地部门的声明报道，轮胎制造商米其林将于今年年底关闭位于墨西哥中部克雷塔罗州的一家工厂。【原文：Tire maker Michelin is set to close a plant in the state of Queretaro in central Mexico by the end of this year, newspaper Reforma reported on Monday, citing a statement from the company's local unit.】
